resources.string: If you enable focus mode your selected app will not be opened.
Click on the add button and select your distracted apps.
Performs restrict selected apps for increase focus.
UltraFocus uses the Accessibility permission to provide features like app monitoring and use tracking to enhance your experience.

Enabling this would unlock the following in UltraFocus:
1. App Blocking
2, Focus Mode 

 UltraFocus needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets UltraFocus block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your deviceâ€”we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.
